abstract: Day 3, in which I present you all with a useful gift.
snippet: Day 3, in which I present you all with a useful gift.
lead_paragraph: Administrivial Heads Up For Friday! The Friday, October 21 crossword puzzle will be available at the normal time and place, but will have a format that will not be available in Across Lite. However, we will be offering a PDF version that you will need to print out to solve. That version will be available here on the blog and the Premium Puzzle Page on Thursday, October 20 at 10 p.m. Eastern time.

headline.main: Wednesday: Day Three of the Crossword Contest
